name: Billiard of Chaos
description: BILLARD OF CHAOS                                A chaotic billard game - You are the white ball and all of the balls you touch is going to attack 8 ball and you must protect it. - - Game gets harder while you are upgrading levels. - - GAMEPLAY - - All the balls you touched with your white ball is going to start moving towards 8 ball. When it reaches 8 ball it starts a timer and when that timer its over 8 ball is going to be eleminated (I was planing on a slider that shows the timer but...) .- - In some levels there can be 2 or 3, 8 balls think them as extra lifes. - Made in 3 days for Brackeys Jam 2021.2 (I know its a 1 week jam i started late)
